items.name: Legends of the Hidden Temple T-Shirt
items.description: An official Orange Legends of the Hidden Temple T-shirt to remember your adventure!

items.name: Nestle Crunch Bars
items.description: A case of delicious Nestle Crunch candy bars!

moat_crossing.description: Teams who cross the moat also receive:

items.name: Moon Shoes
items.description: Anti-gravity shoes that let you bounce to the moon and back!

items.name: Pogs Championship Set
items.description: Official tournament Pogs with 2 exclusive slammers!

steps_of_knowledge.description: Teams reaching the Steps of Knowledge add:

items.name: British Knights Sneakers
items.description: Cool B.K. high-tops in your choice of rad colors!

items.name: Tiger Electronics Talkboy
items.description: The voice recorder from Home Alone 2! Hi kids, we're home early!

temple_games.description: Temple Games prizes (per Pendant of Life earned):

half_pendant.name: Skechers 4-Wheelers
half_pendant.description: Shoes with wheels that pop out - it's shoes! It's skates!

full_pendant.name: Huffy Mountain Bike
full_pendant.description: 18-speed Huffy mountain bike with radical neon paint job!

full_pendant.name: Sega Game Gear
full_pendant.description: Portable gaming system with full-color backlit screen!

pendant_and_half.name: Sony Discman D-121
pendant_and_half.description: Portable CD player with mega bass and anti-skip protection!

pendant_and_half.name: Razor Scooter
pendant_and_half.description: The original aluminum folding scooter that started the craze!

reached_temple.name: Encyclopaedia Britannica CD-ROM
reached_temple.description: The entire encyclopedia on one multimedia CD-ROM!

five_rooms.name: Nintendo 64 Game Bundle
five_rooms.description: GoldenEye 007, Mario Kart 64, and Star Fox 64!

grabbed_artifact.name: Gateway 2000 Computer System
grabbed_artifact.description: Pentium processor, 16MB RAM, 2GB hard drive, and Windows 95!

temple_completion.description: GRAND PRIZE for escaping with the artifact:

grand_prizes.name: Trip to SPACE CAMP!
grand_prizes.description: A week at Space Camp in Huntsville, Alabama! Train like an astronaut with shuttle simulators, moon gravity chairs, and multi-axis trainers!
includes: Round-trip airfare for winner and parent

grand_prizes.name: Toys"R"Us Shopping Spree
grand_prizes.description: Five minutes to grab anything you want at Toys"R"Us!

grand_prizes.name: Nickelodeon Super Soaker Arsenal
grand_prizes.description: Every Super Soaker model including the CPS 2000!

speed_bonus_under_60_seconds.name: Rollerblade Inline Skates
speed_bonus_under_60_seconds.description: Professional inline skates with ABEC-5 bearings!

all_rooms_visited.name: Complete Power Rangers Collection
all_rooms_visited.description: All five original Power Rangers Megazords!

sponsor_announcements: Legends of the Hidden Temple prizes provided by:
Nestle Crunch - For the kid in you!
Gateway 2000 - You've got a friend in the business!
Toys"R"Us - I don't wanna grow up!
U.S. Space Camp - Feel the power, live the dream!
Nickelodeon - The only network for you!
prize_copy_phrases: Tell them what they've won, Kirk!
Going home with some great prizes!
